```{r set up}

getwd()

# Load Packages
library(plyr)

library(agricolae)

#set theme
mytheme <- theme_light(base_size = 14) +
  theme(axis.text = element_text(color = "black"), 
        legend.position = "top")
theme_set(mytheme)

##load in data - change this to pull from the processed file
tracklogs <- read.csv("../Data/Processed/IV_tracklogs_processed.csv")
wpts <- read.csv("../Data/Processed/IV_wpts_processed.csv")

```
```{r explore the data}
str(tracklogs)
```

```{r}
## convert .csv to .shp

 writeOGR(tracklogs, ".", "..Data/Processed/IV_tracklogs_processed.csv", 
           driver = "ESRI Shapefile")

#Read in shapefile into an sf dataframe 
tracklogs_sf <- st_read("../Data/Processed/IV_tracklogs_processed.csv") 

#4. Reveal the CRS of the counties features
st_crs(NE_counties_sf)

#5. Plot the data
NE_map <- mapview(NE_counties_sf,
         crs = 4269, 
         grid = FALSE)
NE_map
```
